column2: "Oh my! Why, hello there! Have you been shooting and killing things?"
"Lisa's in a bit of a bad mood. Something doesn't sit right with her."
"Have you already met them? Those ARKS imitations... Yeah, those ARKS-wannabe Darkers."
"You thought Lisa would be happy to shoot things that look like people? Well, unfortunately she's not!"
"Because, well, they feel like puppets that exist just to be killed, don't they? That's no fun at all!"
"Lisa, you know, she wants to fight someone who's truly fighting to survive with their life on the line."
"Those weak-willed Darker puppets don't get Lisa fired up at all. Photons are all about one's strength of will, after all."
"Oh well. They feel kind of fun to shoot in their own way, so Lisa can still enjoy that sensation. Hehehe."
